title: Acolyte

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preach to a player at night, roleblocking them.
- Forcibly switch a playerâ€™s vote to another during the day, then prevent them from voting further. Lose this ability when the Paragon awakens.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone who visits your target will have their action fail, but they will all learn your name. Everyone you roleblock or fail gives you 1 point.
- When you have accumulated 3 points, the Saint will gain 1 Saint point.
- While the Paragon is alive, you will be unable to fail visits against your targets, but your name will remain hidden.
- You cannot force a player to vote if they are not already voting.
- You may only force a vote switch once per day, and thrice per game.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You could not visit your target because you were distracted by [Acolyte]'s preaching."
